Assertions & coverage with regressions.

Behavioral validation.

Matched Pairs

Common-centroid arrays.

What Our Students Say

Real success stories from VLSI engineers who transformed their careers with us

"I'm thrilled that this Verilog internship has been incredibly beneficial to me.

C. K. Deepavadhana,

RMK Enng College, Chennai

"I had a valuable experience interning at Silicon Craft VLSI, where I received excellent guidance from Dr. Swami and Suresh sir. This internship provided me with a rich learning opportunity, enhancing my skills in Verilog and digital system design."

A. THARUN KRISHNA

Chennai Institute of Technology

"I thoroughly enjoyed the hands-on experience with FPGA boards, comprehensive Verilog HDL training, and interfacing peripherals such as cameras and touch panels. The course environment at Silicon Craft VLSI was ideal for concentrated learning, and within just one month, I gained substantial knowledge. This experience greatly boosted my confidence for upcoming campus interviews with hardware companies. "

JAGADEESH J

VIT, Chennai

"The internship provided extensive knowledge of VLSI, covering both frontend and backend aspects. It deepened my understanding of current trends and fundamentals in the VLSI domain. Previously, I had many questions about VLSI, but now I feel well-informed about the skill set required to excel in a VLSI career."

Jayakumar

RMKCET, Chennai

"Before this internship, VLSI was unfamiliar territory. Over a month, I delved into VLSI's frontend, backend, and career prospects. Starting with fundamentals like FPGA workflows and Verilog, I gained confidence in digital design. Encouraged by supportive instructors, I learned to ask questions freely. This experience ignited my passion for Verilog and SystemVerilog, driving my ambition to excel as a VLSI engineer."

JAGAN K

RMKCET, Chennai

"The FPGA-based system design internship provided invaluable hands-on experience with FPGA boards and Verilog HDL. Supportive instructors simplified complex topics, preparing me well for a VLSI career. Spending my vacation productively was fulfilling, and I've gained new insights into HDL. I'm grateful to Silicon Craft for enriching my knowledge and providing a great overall experience"

NITHYA SREE R S

RMKCET, Chennai

"This internship offered a thorough introduction to VLSI basics and HDL programming. The engaging course materials made learning Verilog and digital design both enjoyable and effective. I gained insights into onchip and offchip protocols and appreciated your teaching approach. I now have clarity regarding my career path in the VLSI domain. This course has been highly beneficial for me."

SIVASUBRA MANIYAN U

RMKCET, Chennai

The serene environment for studying and learning contributed to an overall beneficial course, where I gained valuable knowledge."
